## Deployment

To deploy a new version:

1. Update version in pyproject.toml
2. Build package:

```bash
python -m build .
```

3. Upload to PyPI:

```bash
twine upload dist/yala_events_mcp-{version}.tar.gz dist/yala_events_mcp-{version}-py3-none-any.whl
```

twine upload dist/yala_events_mcp-0.2.0.tar.gz  dist/yala_events_mcp-0.2.0-py3-none-any.whl
